General.Name: Arianne Phosphate Inc
General.Description: Arianne Phosphate Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mining properties in Canada. It primarily focuses on developing Lac à Paul phosphate project located in the Saguenay-Lac St-Jean area, Quebec. Arianne Phosphate Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Chicoutimi, Canada.
General.Address: 393 Racine Street East, Chicoutimi, QC, Canada, G7H 1T2

1.Name: Mr. Jeffrey Howitt Beck Devin Burnett
1.Title: CEO & Non-Independent Director
